trans-unit.id: ProtonMail Plus/Professional/Visionary enables you to add and edit contact details beyond just your contact’s name and email. By using ProtonMail, this data will be as secure as your end-to-end encrypted email.
trans-unit.source: ProtonMail Plus/Professional/Visionary enables you to add and edit contact details beyond just your contact’s name and email. By using ProtonMail, this data will be as secure as your end-to-end encrypted email.
trans-unit.target: ProtonMail Plus / Professional / Visionary, iletişim bilgilerinizi yalnızca kişi adınızın ve e-postanın ötesinde eklemenize ve düzenlemenize olanak tanır. ProtonMail'i kullanarak, bu veriler uçtan uca şifrelenmiş e-postanız kadar güvenli olacaktır.

trans-unit.id: ProtonMail Plus/Professional/Visionary enables you to customize your mobile signature.

trans-unit.id: ProtonMail doesn't sell ads or abuse your privacy. Your support is essential to keeping ProtonMail running. You can upgrade to a paid account or donate to support ProtonMail.
trans-unit.source: ProtonMail doesn't sell ads or abuse your privacy. Your support is essential to keeping ProtonMail running. You can upgrade to a paid account or donate to support ProtonMail.

trans-unit.id: This email has failed its domain's authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
trans-unit.source: This email has failed its domain's authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!

trans-unit.id: This email seems to be from a ProtonMail address but came from outside our system and failed our authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!
trans-unit.source: This email seems to be from a ProtonMail address but came from outside our system and failed our authentication requirements. It may be spoofed or improperly forwarded!

trans-unit.source: What people see in the \"From\" field.

trans-unit.id: You can customize swipe gestures in the ProtonMail App Settings.
trans-unit.source: You can customize swipe gestures in the ProtonMail App Settings.

trans-unit.id: You can get help and support at protonmail.com/support. Bugs can also be reported with the app.
trans-unit.source: You can get help and support at protonmail.com/support. Bugs can also be reported with the app.

trans-unit.id: You can't set %@ address as default because it is a paid feature.
trans-unit.source: You can't set %@ address as default because it is a paid feature.
trans-unit.target: Ücretli bir özellik olduğundan, %@ adresini varsayılan olarak ayarlayamazsınız.

trans-unit.source: You enabled message expiration, but not all recipients support this. Please add a password and/or disable PGP sending to use expiration for all recipients.

trans-unit.id: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save it?

trans-unit.source: You have used %1$d%% of your storage space (%2$@).

trans-unit.source: You have used up all of your storage space (%@).

trans-unit.id: You need at least one recipient to send
trans-unit.source: You need at least one recipient to send
trans-unit.target: Göndermek için en azından bir alıcıya ihtiyacınız var

trans-unit.id: Your inbox is now protected with end-to-end encryption. To automatically securely email friends, have them get ProtonMail! You can also manually encrypt messages to them if they don't use ProtonMail.
trans-unit.source: Your inbox is now protected with end-to-end encryption. To automatically securely email friends, have them get ProtonMail! You can also manually encrypt messages to them if they don't use ProtonMail.
trans-unit.target: Gelen kutunuz artık uçtan uca şifreleme ile korunmaktadır. Arkadaşlarınıza otomatik olarak güvenli bir şekilde e-posta göndermek için ProtonMail'i edinin! ProtonMail kullanmıyorlarsa, iletileri el ile de şifreleyebilirsiniz.

trans-unit.id: Your new encrypted email account has been set up and is ready to send and receive encrypted messages.
trans-unit.source: Your new encrypted email account has been set up and is ready to send and receive encrypted messages.
trans-unit.target: Yeni şifreli e-posta hesabınız kuruldu ve şifrelenmiş mesajlar göndermeye ve almaya hazır.

trans-unit.id: Your new secure email\r\n account is ready.
trans-unit.source: Your new secure email\r\n account is ready.

trans-unit.id: attempt remaining until secure data wipe!
trans-unit.source: attempt remaining until secure data wipe!
trans-unit.target: güvenli veri silinene kadar kalmaya çalışın!

trans-unit.id: attempts remaining until secure data wipe!
trans-unit.source: attempts remaining until secure data wipe!
trans-unit.target: güvenli veri silinene kadar kalmaya devam eder!

trans-unit.id: get contacts() failed, peopleOrderedByUsersPreference return null!!
trans-unit.source: get contacts() failed, peopleOrderedByUsersPreference return null!!
trans-unit.target: contacts() getirilirken hata oluştu, peopleOrderedByUsersPreference boş sonuç döndürdü!!

trans-unit.note: no object error, local only , this could be not translated!

trans-unit.id: App Extension API is not available in this version of iOS
trans-unit.source: App Extension API is not available in this version of iOS
trans-unit.target: Uygulama Uzantı API'ı bu iOS sürümünde mevcut değil

trans-unit.id: Failed to contact the Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to contact the Password Extension

trans-unit.id: Failed to execute script that collects web page information
trans-unit.source: Failed to execute script that collects web page information
trans-unit.target: Web sayfası bilgilerini toplayan komut dosyası çalıştırılamadı

trans-unit.id: Failed to fill web page because script could not be evaluated
trans-unit.source: Failed to fill web page because script could not be evaluated
trans-unit.target: Komut dosyası değerlendirilemediğinden web sayfası doldurulamadı

trans-unit.id: Failed to fill web page because script is missing
trans-unit.source: Failed to fill web page because script is missing
trans-unit.target: Komut dosyası eksik olduğu için web sayfası doldurulamadı

trans-unit.id: Failed to obtain URL String from web view. The web view must be loaded completely when calling the Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to obtain URL String from web view. The web view must be loaded completely when calling the Password Extension
trans-unit.target: Web görünümünden URL dizisi alınamadı. Parola Eklentisi çağırılmadan önce web görüntüsü tamamen yüklenmelidir

trans-unit.id: Failed to parse information returned by Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to parse information returned by Password Extension
trans-unit.target: Parola Uzantısı tarafından döndürülen bilgiler ayrıştırılamadı

trans-unit.id: Password Extension was cancelled by the user
trans-unit.source: Password Extension was cancelled by the user
trans-unit.target: Parola Uzantısı kullanıcı tarafından iptal edildi
